name: Craft your beat!
description:
Craft your beat! is a 2D Rythmic chilling game with minimal art syle. Dash through your enemies and enjoy randomly generated drum beats.

Features
  • Randomly generated drum beat combinations
  • Minimal art style
  • Full controller support
Credits
  • PeeJay
  • Osmic
  • The Cynic Project / cynicmusic.com / pixelsphere.org
  • Little Robot Sound Factory - www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com
  • Chris Naron
  • p0ss
  • kenney.nl
Additional information
  • C.Y.B! has born from a simple prototype idea and eventually (after 1 week) become a minimal game with simple (but fun) mechanic.
